General.Name: Asian Granito India Limited
General.Description: Asian Granito India Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells tiles, marbles, sanitaryware, faucets, and quartz products in India. The company offers floor, wall, and parking tiles, glazed and polished vitrified tiles, double charge tiles, countertops, marble surfaces, bath ware, fittings, and construction chemicals. It also offers showers, water closets, basins, urinals, cisterns, seat covers, and bathroom accessories. The company distributes its products through a network of dealers and sub-dealers, display centers, and exclusive showrooms. It exports its products internationally. Asian Granito India Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, India.
